answer:
QUESTION

i have been married fro a year now. its been a "rocky" marriage.during a heated argument 3 weeks ago when i was extremely angry , i said to my wife , i give u one talaaq,two talaaq,three talaaq. i regret my actions as this was not my intention.

during my research regarding what i have said there's mixed views. my wife is currently @ her mum's place. a few days after saying 3 talaaqs , i made dua to allah to forgive me & give me some indication that this marriage needs to work as i really want it too. 2 days later my wife found out that she was pregnant.

is our marriage still valid ???

ANSWER


Share:

Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

Your pronouncement of three Talaqs  has permanently terminated your marriage. (Talaq-e-Mugallazah) It is not permissible for you to live as husband and wife.

 

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

 

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
